data.weather: Dry and bright early part of last week, but overcast on Thursday and Friday, with a very strong breeze on Friday. Overcast, strong breeze and occasional burst of drizzly rain on Saturday and Sunday. 2.5mm rain overnight into Monday. Further 1mm on Monday morning. Dry and breezy day on Monday, followed by 5mm rain overnight into Tuesday, making just short of 9mm in total since Sunday evening. Odd shower forecast for Tuesday AM, otherwise bright and clear day, with steady breeze.
data.other: Going Enquiries: Jonjo Sanderson - 07831 437453 Ian Ward - 07880 722586
